about_the_game:
Includes:
・Unit and Scenario Pack 1: Two additional scenario missions and two additional playable units
・Unit and Scenario Pack 2: Two additional scenario missions and two additional playable units
・Unit and Scenario Pack 3: Two additional scenario missions and three additional playable units
・Season Pass Purchase Bonus: Limit Break Materials Pack 1
First level Limit Break materials may be obtained to further strengthen your units.

*The Unit and Scenario Packs will also be available for individual purchase. Please avoid duplicate purchases.
detailed_description:
Includes:
・Unit and Scenario Pack 1: Two additional scenario missions and two additional playable units
・Unit and Scenario Pack 2: Two additional scenario missions and two additional playable units
・Unit and Scenario Pack 3: Two additional scenario missions and three additional playable units
・Season Pass Purchase Bonus: Limit Break Materials Pack 1
First level Limit Break materials may be obtained to further strengthen your units.

*The Unit and Scenario Packs will also be available for individual purchase. Please avoid duplicate purchases.
name: SD GUNDAM BATTLE ALLIANCE - Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
